title: Scant data protection exposes internet users in Africa
text:
Scant data protection exposes internet users in Africa 4:16pm BST - 01:30 
In Kenya, which has a large and fast growing population of internet users, there are no specific laws or regulations to protect the privacy of those individuals, leaving users exposed.   
In Kenya, which has a large and fast growing population of internet users, there are no specific laws or regulations to protect the privacy of those individuals, leaving users exposed.  //reut.rs/2H6t9Vj
